languages.text: Приказ Лорд-капитана, звучащий через вокс-устройство, остается не услышанным — поглощенные уничтожающими дух и разум видениями, солдаты открывают огонь. Беспорядочная стрельба по маяку и контейнерам приводит к яркому взрыву, в котором гибнут бойцы и растворяются отвратительные творения гемункула.

traits.locale_text: Приказ Лорд-капитана, звучащий через вокс-устройство, остается не услышанным — поглощенные уничтожающими дух и разум видениями, солдаты открывают огонь. Беспорядочная стрельба по маяку и контейнерам приводит к яркому взрыву, в котором гибнут бойцы и растворяются отвратительные творения гемункула.

languages.text: The Lord Captain's order sent through vox-devices remains unheard by the soldiers — consumed by mind-destroying visions, they open fire in an attempt to preserve their souls. Their haphazard volley directed at the beacon and containers leads to a bright explosion, in which both the warriors and the Haemonculus's heinous works perish.
languages.original_text: Приказ Лорд-капитана, звучащий через вокс-устройство, остается не услышанным — поглощенные уничтожающими дух и разум видениями, солдаты открывают огонь. Беспорядочная стрельба по маяку и контейнерам приводит к яркому взрыву, в котором гибнут бойцы и растворяются отвратительные творения гемункула.

traits.locale_text: The Lord Captain's order carried by vox-device remains unheard — consumed by mind-destroying visions, the soldiers open fire in an attempt to preserve their souls. Their haphazard volley directed at the beacon and containers leads to a bright explosion, in which perish both the warriors and the Haemonculus's heinous works.

The Lord Captain's order carried by vox-device remains unheard — consumed by mind-destroying visions, the soldiers open fire in an attempt to preserve their souls. Their haphazard volley directed at the beacon and containers leads to a bright explosion, in which perish both the warriors and the Haemonculus's heinous works.

The Lord Captain's order sent through vox-devices remains unheard by the soldiers — consumed by mind-destroying visions, they open fire in an attempt to preserve their souls. Their haphazard volley directed at the beacon and containers leads to a bright explosion, in which both the warriors and the Haemonculus's heinous works perish.

The Lord Captain's order sent through vox-devices remains unheard by the soldiers — consumed by mind-destroying visions, they open fire in an attempt to preserve their souls. Their haphazard volley directed at the beacon and containers leads to a bright explosion, in which both the warriors and the Haemonculus's heinous works perish.

The Lord Captain's order sent through vox-devices remains unheard by the soldiers — consumed by mind-destroying visions, they open fire in an attempt to preserve their souls. Their haphazard volley directed at the beacon and containers leads to a bright explosion, in which both the warriors and the Haemonculus's heinous works perish.

languages.text: 那些士兵并没有听到领主舰长通过音阵装置发出的命令，幻象吞噬了他们的心智。士兵们胡乱开火，试图保护他们的灵魂。他们肆意朝集装箱和信标开火，扫射最终引发了一场剧烈的爆炸。无论是士兵还是血伶人的可怖造物，都在这场爆炸中灰飞烟灭。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain's order sent through vox-devices remains unheard by the soldiers — consumed by mind-destroying visions, they open fire in an attempt to preserve their souls. Their haphazard volley directed at the beacon and containers leads to a bright explosion, in which both the warriors and the Haemonculus's heinous works perish.

traits.locale_text: 那些士兵并没有听到领主舰长通过音阵装置发出的命令，幻象吞噬了他们的心智。士兵们胡乱开火，试图保护他们的灵魂。他们肆意朝集装箱和信标开火，扫射最终引发了一场剧烈的爆炸。无论是士兵还是血伶人的可怖造物，都在这场爆炸中灰飞烟灭。

languages.text: ヴォクス装置から送られるロード・キャプテンの命令は兵士たちの耳には届かない…彼らは精神が破壊されるような幻覚に蝕まれ、自らの魂を守ろうと発砲する。ビーコンとコンテナに向けられた闇雲な一斉射撃は、まばゆい爆発を引き起こし、戦士たちとハモンキュラスの凶悪な作品、その両方がチリと化した。
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain's order sent through vox-devices remains unheard by the soldiers — consumed by mind-destroying visions, they open fire in an attempt to preserve their souls. Their haphazard volley directed at the beacon and containers leads to a bright explosion, in which both the warriors and the Haemonculus's heinous works perish.

traits.locale_text: ヴォクス装置から送られるロード・キャプテンの命令は兵士たちの耳には届かない…彼らは精神が破壊されるような幻覚に蝕まれ、自らの魂を守ろうと発砲する。ビーコンとコンテナに向けられた闇雲な一斉射撃は、まばゆい爆発を引き起こし、戦士たちとハモンキュラスの凶悪な作品、その両方がチリと化した。

languages.text: Los soldados no escuchan las órdenes {mf|del|de la} Lord Capitán enviadas a través de los dispositivos voco y, consumidos por visiones que destruyen sus mentes, abren fuego en un intento de preservar sus almas. Su desordenada andanada dirigida contra la baliza y los contenedores provoca una brillante explosión, en la que perecen tanto los guerreros como las atroces obras del Hemónculo.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain's order sent through vox-devices remains unheard by the soldiers — consumed by mind-destroying visions, they open fire in an attempt to preserve their souls. Their haphazard volley directed at the beacon and containers leads to a bright explosion, in which both the warriors and the Haemonculus's heinous works perish.

traits.locale_text: Los soldados no escuchan las órdenes {mf|del|de la} Lord Capitán enviadas a través de los dispositivos voco y, consumidos por visiones que destruyen sus mentes, abren fuego en un intento de preservar sus almas. Su desordenada andanada dirigida contra la baliza y los contenedores provoca una brillante explosión, en la que perecen tanto los guerreros como las atroces obras del Hemónculo.

languages.text: Die Soldaten hören die per Vox übertragenen Befehle des Lord Captains nicht — sie werden von Visionen geplagt, die ihren Verstand zerstören, und öffnen das Feuer, um ihre Seelen zu retten. Ihre unkontrollierte Salve in Richtung des Senders und der Container führt zu einer gleißenden Explosion, bei der sowohl die Krieger als auch die schändlichen Werke des Haemonculus verenden.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain's order sent through vox-devices remains unheard by the soldiers — consumed by mind-destroying visions, they open fire in an attempt to preserve their souls. Their haphazard volley directed at the beacon and containers leads to a bright explosion, in which both the warriors and the Haemonculus's heinous works perish.

traits.locale_text: Die Soldaten hören die per Vox übertragenen Befehle des Lord Captains nicht — sie werden von Visionen geplagt, die ihren Verstand zerstören, und öffnen das Feuer, um ihre Seelen zu retten. Ihre unkontrollierte Salve in Richtung des Senders und der Container führt zu einer gleißenden Explosion, bei der sowohl die Krieger als auch die schändlichen Werke des Haemonculus verenden.

languages.text: Rendus sourds par ces hallucinations accablantes, les soldats n'entendent pas l'ordre relayé par les récepteurs-vox et ouvrent le feu dans une tentative désespérée pour préserver leurs âmes. La salve décousue tirée en direction de la balise et des conteneurs provoque une explosion lumineuse, tuant sur le coup les guerriers et les abominables créations de l'hémoncule.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain's order sent through vox-devices remains unheard by the soldiers — consumed by mind-destroying visions, they open fire in an attempt to preserve their souls. Their haphazard volley directed at the beacon and containers leads to a bright explosion, in which both the warriors and the Haemonculus's heinous works perish.

traits.locale_text: Rendus sourds par ces hallucinations accablantes, les soldats n'entendent pas l'ordre relayé par les récepteurs-vox et ouvrent le feu dans une tentative désespérée pour préserver leurs âmes. La salve décousue tirée en direction de la balise et des conteneurs provoque une explosion lumineuse, tuant sur le coup les guerriers et les abominables créations de l'hémoncule.

languages.text: Bu ezici görüntülerin etkisinde duyma yetilerini yitiren askerler, Lord Kaptan'ın voks cihazları aracılığıyla gönderdiği emri duymuyor ve ruhlarını korumak için umutsuzca ateş açıyor. Parıldağı ve konteyneri hedef alan bu saldırı, parlak bir patlamayla sonuçlanarak hem savaşçıları hem de Haimonkulus'un iğrenç yaratıklarını anında öldürüyor.
languages.original_text: The Lord Captain's order sent through vox-devices remains unheard by the soldiers — consumed by mind-destroying visions, they open fire in an attempt to preserve their souls. Their haphazard volley directed at the beacon and containers leads to a bright explosion, in which both the warriors and the Haemonculus's heinous works perish.
